title: iPod packaging, Microsoft style
content:
This is a hilarious satire in branding. The iPod packaging Microsoft style…

[http://video.google.com/videoplay?docid=4313772690011721857](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329175038/http:/video.google.com/videoplay?docid=4313772690011721857)

(Sorry if you’ve seen this already.)
author: Joe Pemberton

comments.content: Yea saw it. Its funny because its true.
This ‘story’ took quite an interesting turn: ‘ _[Microsoft Confirms it Originated iPod Box Parody Video](http://web.archive.org/web/20060329175038/http:/www.ipodobserver.com/story/25957)_’.
Ah, it gets better. Thanks for the links.

nice to hear that

Tomas Hellix
